briefTitle: Turkish Version of Breast Edema Questionnare: Validity and Reliability Study
officialTitle: Turkish Version of Breast Edema Questionnare: Validity and Reliability Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Individuals with a diagnosis of breast cancer who have undergone breast-conserving surgery
* individuals who have signed the Informed Consent form

Exclusion Criteria:

* illiterate individuals
